abstract: Chinese government is determined to become front-runner in water desalination industry, and will operate $4 billion Beijiang Power and Desalination Plant at significant financial loss in order to do so; analysts draw comparisons to China's past successes in solar panel and wind turbine industries.
snippet: The Chinese government hopes to become a force in yet another environment-related industry: supplying the world with desalinated water.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese government hopes to become a force in yet another environment-related industry: supplying the world with desalinated water.

headline.main: China Takes a Loss to Get Ahead in the Business of Fresh Water
headline.print_headline: China Takes a Loss to Get Ahead in the Business of Fresh Water
headline.seo: China Takes Loss to Get Ahead in Desalination Industry
